thread.title: Who’s Killing Off Residents of This Island Nation? Crime Writers

author: Alistair MacDonald
title: Who’s Killing Off Residents of This Island Nation? Crime Writers
text:
TJØRNUVÍK, Faroe Islands—Detective Hjalti Hentze of the Faroe Islands police force stared at the corpse. Washed up like driftwood in the freezing surf. Peppered with buckshot. He thought of the car he’d discovered not far away, an unconscious man at the wheel. A shotgun on the seat.
But Jens Jensen, a veteran detective in this isolated North Atlantic nation, was perplexed. Tjørnuvík? “It’s a very quiet village,” he said. “I don’t know of any murder happening there, or any crime happening there.”
...
